de.dfki.lt.hfc

Class Aggregate

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.lt.hfc.Aggregate

  • public class Aggregate
extends java.lang.Object
    aggregates are represented by their name and a sequence of SELECT variables (negative ints) or constants (positive ints)
    Since:
    JDK 1.5
